Developed by the innovative and award-winning team at Straightlabs, the XR Trainer - From Knowledge to Competence. Experience scientifically grounded content and learning formats in a whole new way! The XR Trainer turns learning into an exciting adventure. Immerse yourself in realistic scenarios, interact with virtual characters, and make decisions that influence the course of conversations. With the non-linear structure of the scenarios, every training session remains varied and offers numerous conversation paths.

Have you ever wished to improve your communication skills without taking risks in the real world?
With the XR Trainer, it's possible! Our innovative VR app provides a safe environment where you can effectively and playfully train your soft skills.

Now new!
The eLearning Award-winning module "The Other's Thoughts," developed in collaboration with META. Explore intercultural communication in the contexts of India, China, and Morocco.

Why choose the XR Trainer?
Thanks to our cross-platform technology, you can train on VR headsets, smartphones, tablets, desktops, and laptops â€“ flexibly, wherever you are. Our adaptive feedback system provides valuable insights into your strengths and areas for improvement after each session, allowing you to continuously develop your skills.

Experience the future of learning! The XR Trainer - your personal soft skills coach, anytime and anywhere.
